trace_targets.description: Plans a multi-segment path to trace a series of targets, avoiding obstacles. It reads environment data, loads targets, plans a path using A*, and saves the resulting path to a file.

inputs.name: input_target_path
inputs.description: Path to the text file containing target coordinates.

inputs.name: output_target_path
inputs.description: Path where the final planned path coordinates will be saved.

inputs.name: start
inputs.description: Optional starting coordinates (x, y). If None, uses the robot's position from the data folder.

inputs.name: data_folder
inputs.description: Folder containing environment data like arena corners, obstacles, and robot position.

inputs.name: spacing
inputs.description: The spacing used to create a safety buffer around obstacles.

output.description: A confirmation message indicating that the path has been planned and saved successfully.
